# Laravel 11 Laundry POS System - Project Instructions

## Project Overview

Custom Laundry POS System for Qatar market deployed on shared cPanel hosting (IT Nut Hosting).

## Tech Stack

-   Laravel 11
-   Livewire 3
-   Tailwind CSS
-   Alpine.js
-   MySQL

## Design Guidelines

-   Primary Color: Purple (#7c3aed)
-   Layout: Sidebar navigation (Amazing Laundry style)
-   Currency: QAR (Qatar Riyal)
-   Language: English
-   Strict PHP typing enabled

## Development Constraints

-   ✅ Local storage only (public disk) - NO external APIs
-   ✅ NO S3, Cloudinary, or Firebase
-   ✅ Use Livewire Components for dynamic pages (POS, Orders, etc.)
-   ✅ Use Blade Components for UI elements (Cards, Buttons, Inputs)
-   ✅ Shared hosting compatible (cPanel)

## Project Setup Status

-   [x] Create project structure
-   [ ] Scaffold Laravel 11 project
-   [ ] Install dependencies (Livewire 3, Tailwind CSS)
-   [ ] Create database migrations
-   [ ] Setup authentication
